[//]: # (title: Row Template)
[//]: # (category: Oden Table)
[//]: # (icon: fa-table)


# Oden Row Template Directive
Placeholder for table row.


Basic Usage:
```
<oden-table [rows]="Array<any>|null">
    <th odenHeader></th>
    <ng-template odenRowTemplate let-row="row">
        <tr odenRow>
            <td odenCell>{{ row.id }}</td>
        </tr>
    </ng-template>
</oden-table>
```


## Structure

    <ng-template odenRowTemplate let-row="row"></ng-template>


### Description:
Placeholder for table row.
